author: IBM Technology
description:
Want to try LangChain RAG for yourself? Find the code here → https://ibm.biz/BdGbGR

Ready to become a certified Associate Generative AI Engineer? Register now and use code IBMTechYT20 for 20% off of your exam → https://ibm.biz/BdGpSC

Curious about optimizing your AI models? Join Data Scientist Erika Russi as she demonstrates how to leverage LangChain RAG to keep your large language models up-to-date. Learn practical steps for setting up a retriever, creating a knowledge base, and enabling your models to answer complex queries. 🚀📚🤖

AI news moves fast. Sign up for a monthly newsletter for AI updates from IBM → https://ibm.biz/BdGba9

title: LangChain RAG: Optimizing AI Models for Accurate Responses
